title.new_merge_request: New merge request assigned to you

message.new_merge_request: The Merge Request '{mrTitle}' was assigned to you. Please review the changes.
message.new_merge_commit: The Merge Request '{mrTitle}' received a new commit. Please review the changes.
message.new_merge_request_note: The merge request '{mrTitle}' was commented. Please review the comments.
message.update_merge_request_note: A comment on merge request '{mrTitle}' was updated. Please review the comments.

hints.apiToken: Private API token (needs the read-api permissions)

alerts.invalid-credentials: Not able to connect to the gitlab server using this combination of host and api-token

body.description: This browser extension is a tool to receive GitLab notifications on your operating system. It was created out of the need to handle review requests more quickly and efficiently within the team.
body.legals: This browser extension is not developed, supported, or maintained by GitLab Inc. It is an independent project that is not affiliated with GitLab.
body.license: The browser extension is licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 3 (GPL-3). For more information on the license and terms, please refer to the LICENSE file in the project.

labels.new_review_merge_request: Send notification when a new merge request review is requested from you
labels.update_review_merge_request: Send notification when a merge request where you are a reviewer gets an update
labels.new_comment_own_merge_request: Send notification when a new comment was added to one of the merge requests you are assigned to
labels.update_comment_own_merge_request: Send notification when a comment was updated on one one of the merge requests you are assigned to
